file.name: domain-scopeId.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  title: Eclipse Kapua REST API - Domains
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: Eclipse Kapua Dev Team
    url: https://eclipse.org/kapua
    email: kapua-dev@eclipse.org
  license:
    name: Eclipse Public License 2.0
    url: https://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

paths:
  /{scopeId}/domains:
    get:
      tags:
        - Domain
      summary: Get all the Domains
      operationId: domainList
      parameters:
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/scopeId'
        - name: name
          in: query
          description: The domain name to filter results
          schema:
            type: string
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/limit'
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/offset'
      responses:
        200:
          description: The list of the Domains available in the Scope
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './domain.yaml#/components/schemas/domainListResult'
        401:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/unauthenticated'
        403:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/subjectUnauthorized'
        500:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/kapuaError'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/{scopeId}/domains": get: operation "domainList": parameters: parse parameter "": at 1:379: external "../openapi.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
